🧮 Advanced Problem 3

“Try to solve it using only elementary school knowledge!”

In the figure, rectangle T and rectangle S overlap.

The overlapping area is: 1/7 of rectangle T 2/5 of rectangle S The total area of the combined shape (considered as one figure) is 85 cm².

Question: What is the area of rectangle T?

📝 Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
